channel.title: Just create, every day. Let's bring people up
channel.description:
I found this inspirational today.
Watch the video to hear his passion. https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6361380798980980737
"Sometimes you just need to create, sometimes you just need to mess up, sometimes you just need to focus on that quantity, to get the reps in so the quality comes later. I'm sick of seeing people quit because of negativity, I'm sick of seeing people quit because of people putting them down, because they don't have support...lets just be there for people... lets create to create. Let help one another, let's bring people up." - Quentin Allums

item.title: Just create, every day. Let's bring people up
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Nothing like figuring out what is crap by comparing the tonne of crap you might make to the one happy accident!

Read full topic

item.description:
I am probably going to start doing this once I get premium. I won’t post them, but I’ll make new ideas.

item.title: Just create, every day. Let's bring people up
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
Yep. Nothing wrong with trying lots of stuff in the creative world. Especially on the Internet where crap will soon be forgotten but good will be remembered.

Read full topic
item.source: Just create, every day. Let's bring people up

item.title: Just create, every day. Let's bring people up
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
Nice. I feel the same way. I like to create a new song every day and a lot of people say I shouldn’t but because I create a new song every day I have all these new ideas flowing and although not all of them are good, some of them are great and I’m always getting better and learning something new every day.

Read full topic
item.source: Just create, every day. Let's bring people up
